desc: Set stow dir, default $STOW_DIR or current dir
Set target dir, default parent of stow dir
Ignore files ending in this Perl regex
Don't stow files beginning with this Perl regex if already stowed
Force stowing files beginning with this Perl regex if already stowed
Create dirs instead of symlinks to whole dirs
Move existing files into stow dir if target exists (AND OVERWRITE!)
Increase verbosity by 1 (levels are from 0 to 5)
Increase verbosity by 1 or set it with verbose=N [0..5]
Unstow the package names that follow this option
Stow the package names that follow this option
Restow: delete and then stow again
